name: Transaction.RevocationReason
desc: Reasons that describe why the App Store may refund a transaction or revoke it from family sharing.

items.name: static let developerIssue: Transaction.RevocationReason
items.desc: Customer canceled the transaction due to an actual or perceived issue within your app.

items.name: static let other: Transaction.RevocationReason
items.desc: Customer canceled the transaction for other reasons.

items.name: typealias Transaction.RevocationReason.RawValue
items.desc: The type that represents the raw value of a transaction revocation reason.

items.name: static func != (Transaction.RevocationReason, Transaction.RevocationReason) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: The localized text that describes the revocation reason.
